  "description": "Outcess Solutions Nigeria Limited&nbsp;is an outcessing company that provide digital Services to different clients in Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Care Executive
Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a dedicated and customer-focused Customer Care Executive to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for addressing customer inquiries, resolving complaints, and ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction across all touchpoints.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an SSCE Certificate with 0 - 1 year of work experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;Annastasia.Onuorah@outcess.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Customer Care Executive Job at Outcess Solutions Nigeria Limited




        
    

        
        Outcess Solutions Nigeria Limited is an outcessing company that provide digital Services to different clients in Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Care Executive
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a dedicated and customer-focused Customer Care Executive to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for addressing customer inquiries, resolving complaints, and ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction across all touchpoints.


Requirements
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Interested candidates should possess an SSCE Certificate with 0 - 1 year of work experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Annastasia.Onuorah@outcess.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
